sentences.cn: …特拉华河港务局，佩恩码头的一个大股东。

sentences.en: A stakeholder is as anyone who is materially affected by the outcome of the project.
sentences.cn: 涉众是所有会受到项目结果重大影响的人.

sentences.en: Focal point and dynamics of managing models and confirming the stakeholder management through the ration.
sentences.cn: 通过定量管理模型确定对各利益相关者管理的重点和力度.

sentences.en: He is a dissertation on stakeholder dynamics in management information systems.
sentences.cn: 理查?华森是佐治亚大学管理信息系统部的代理经理.

sentences.en: He is now completing a dissertation on stakeholder dynamics in management information systems.
sentences.cn: 现在,他已经顺利通过了该专业的硕士论文答辩.

sentences.en: It must employ all of its assets and financial instruments for the benefit of every stakeholder.
sentences.cn: 它运用资产和金融工具的目的应该是出于每一位利益相关者的利益.

sentences.en: SG 1 : Stakeholder needs, expectations, constraints, and interfaces are collected and translated into customer requirements.
sentences.cn: 干系 人的需要 、 望 、 束和接口要求被收集并转化为客户需求.

sentences.en: Stakeholder feedback is also integral part of developing this report.
sentences.cn: 利益相关者的反馈也是发展这一报告的组成部分.

sentences.en: Stakeholder needs, wants, and expectations are analyzed and converted into requirements.
sentences.cn: 利害关系者的需要 、 愿望与期望经过分析变成了要求说明书.

sentences.en: The software and methodology of event diagramming will be presented, as it relates to stakeholder analysis.
sentences.cn: 介绍事件图描绘的软件工具与方法,一并提起利害关系人分析.

sentences.en: The Water Framework Directive: Stakeholder Preferences and Catchment Management Strategies - Are They Reconcilable?
sentences.cn: 欧盟水框架指令: 利益相关者的喜好和流域管理策略——它们是可协调的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Therefore, the corporate management and improvement particularly rely on the cooperation and coordination among each stakeholder.
sentences.cn: 因此, 公司的运行和发展依赖于各利益相关者之间的合作与协调.

sentences.en: This paper analyzes the stakeholder theory and points out its defects.
sentences.cn: 但是,作为一方新兴的理论,其理论基础和实践都存在不足.

sentences.en: This thesis aimed on studying the outcome of effect by stakeholder on accounting information disclosure.
sentences.cn: 本文主要研究上市公司的利益相关者对会计信息披露的影响结果.

sentences.cn: 盟水框架指令: 利益相关者的喜好和流域管理策略--它们是可协调的 吗 ?
